name: Psyche E
description:
A point and click adventure game. Very strange. Very stupid. Very smart. Journey through bizarre lands with your ego.

Windows only right now, sorry.

This will be the first game in an eventual series.

Combines many different styles of art such as pixel, hand-drawn, collage.

Made by me (@joshtroach) and the wonderful Ryan Melmoth(@ryanmelmoth and http://ryanmelmoth.itch.io/).
